If you are a graduate (or prospective graduate) student , the Graduate Studies staff are most likely to be able to assist you with any issues you are having.  If you are in or interested the various Teaching of Mathematics programs at UIC, please contact the Office of Math Education .       Undergraduate Program      Ignacio
